name: Edgy Boss Fight
description:
Fullscreen recommended

This game was created for the Vim Jam 2.

Controls:

[A] [D] = Movement

[W] [Space] = Jump

[M] Shoot

Known bugs:

- sometimes the music wont restart after game over.

Credits:

All graphics are made by myself.

All other assets are purchased via bundles like (humble bundle etc)

Font: 1980 by Void.

Music:

wowsoundsg: Silly Comedy Music Pack - SC_Thickheaded_Short_Loop

Abstraction - Out of Time

rude66: The complete audio and FX bundle - Silent
